item.title: Trump announces SoftBank will make $100 billion investment in the US
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump announced Monday that SoftBank will make a $100 billion investment in the U.S. that will create 100,000 jobs.

item.title: Biden and Harris make appeal to Democrats at holiday reception
item.description: Biden, who has just over a month left in office, talked about his legacy and the lasting effect he wanted to leave on America.
